name: Final Festival
description:
FINAL FESTIVAL - A game about saying goodbye.

The year is 2005. You play as Rowan, a disheartened boy trying to salvage the remaining memories of his past. 

Collect all 13 Zodiac Essences, save the festival, and defy god, in this adventure game created in GB Studio for the Low Effort 5 game jam.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - Play in Browser

ADDITIONALLY... 

The game may take some time to load. There may be bugs. 

The game takes around 15 minutes to complete.

Some characters may say extra things if you talk to them again.

Soundtrack coming soon eventually...
